Verses: 1 pillaiperaadha Maladiye, Magizhndhupaadu; Karppavedhanaippadaadhavale, Gembeeramaaip Paadi Aanandhasaththamidu; Vaazhkkaippattavaludaiya Pillaigalaip Paarkkilum, Anaadha Sthreeyinudaiya Pillaigal Adhigam Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
2 un Koodaaraththin Idaththai Visaalamaakku; Un Vaasasthalangalin Thiraigal Virivaagattum; Thadaiseyyaadhe; Un Kayirugalai Neelamaakki, Un Mulaigalai Urudhippaduththu.
3 nee Valadhupuraththilum Idadhupuraththilum Idankondu Peruguvaai; Un Sandhadhiyaar Jaadhigalai Sudhandhariththukkondu, Paazhaaikkidandha Pattanangalaik Kudiyetruvippaargal.
4 bayappadaadhe, Nee Vetkappaduvadhillai; Naanaadhe, Nee Lachchaiyadaivadhillai; Un Vaalibaththin Vetkaththai Nee Marandhu, Un Vidhavaiyiruppin Nindhaiyai Ini Ninaiyaadhiruppaai.
5 un Sirushtigare Un Naayagar; Senaigalin Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam; Isravelin Parisuththar Un Meetpar, Avar Sarvaboomiyin Dhevan Ennappaduvaar.
6 kaividappattu Manamnondhavalaana Sthreeyaippolavum, Ilam Praayaththil Vivaagancheydhu Thallappatta Manaiviyaippolavum Irukkira Unnaikkarththar Azhaiththaar Endru Un Dhevan Sollugiraar.
7 imaippozhudhu Unnaik Kaivitten; Aanaalum Urukkamaana Irakkangalaal, Unnai Serththukkolven.
8 arpakaalam Moonda Kobaththinaal En Mugaththai Imaippozhudhu Unakku Maraiththen; Aanaalum Niththiya Kirubaiyudan Unakku Iranguven Endrukarththaraagiya Un Meetpar Sollugiraar.

9 idhu Enakku Novaavin Kaalaththilundaana Vellampolirukkum; Novaavin Kaalaththilundaana Vellam Ini Boomiyinmel Puranduvaruvadhillai Endru Naan Aanaiyittadhupola, Unmel Naan Kobankolvadhillaiyendrum, Unnai Naan Kadindhukolvadhillaiyendrum Aanaiyitten.

10 malaigal Vilaginaalum, Parvadhangal Nilaipeyarndhaalum, En Kirubai Unnaivittu Vilagaamalum, En Samaadhaanaththin Udanpadikkai Nilaipeyaraamalum Irukkum Endru, Unmel Manadhurugugira Karththar Sollugiraar.
11 sirumaippattavale, Perungaatril Adipattavale, Thetraravatravale, Idho, Naan Un Kallugalaip Pragaasikkumpadi Vaiththu, Neelaraththinangalai Un Asthibaaramaakki,
12 un Palaganigalaip Palingum, Un Vaasalgalai Maanikkak Karkalum, Un Madhilgalaiyellaam Uchchidhamaana Karkalumaakkuven.
13 un Pillaigalellaarum Karththaraal Podhikkappattiruppaargal; Un Pillaigaludaiya Samaadhaanam Peridhaayirukkum.
14 needhiyinaal Sthirappattiruppaai; Kodumaikku Dhooramaavaai; Bayamillaadhiruppaai, Thigilukku Dhooramaavaai, Adhu Unnai Anuguvadhillai.
15 idho, Unakku Virodhamaaik Koottankoodinaal, Adhu Ennaale Koodugira Koottamalla; Evargal Unakku Virodhamaaik Koodugiraargalo, Avargal Un Patchaththil Varuvaargal.
16 idho, Karineruppai Oodhi, Thankiriyaikkaana Aayudhaththai Undupannugira Kollanaiyum Naan Sirushtiththen; Keduththu Nikkiragamaakkugiravanaiyum Naan Sirushtiththen.

17 unakku Virodhamaai Uruvaakkappadum Endha Aayudhamum Vaaikkaadhepom; Unakku Virodhamaai Nyaayaththil Ezhumbum Endha Naavaiyum Nee Kutrappaduththuvaai; Idhu Karththarudaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Sudhandharamum Ennaalundaana Avargaludaiya Needhiyumaayirukkiradhendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
